root.name: Remember 11: The Age of Infinity
root.description: OverviewRemember11: The Age of Infinity is the fourth entry in the Infinity series of visual novels developed by KID. The game was originally released on the Playstation 2 on March 18, 2004 and was later ported to the PC in 2008 and PSP in 2010 by CyberFront. A majority of the Infinity series has not been officially released in English, the only exception being Ever17. However the visual novel translation group, TL Wiki, did release a fan made English patch for the PC version of Remember11 on October 11, 2010.
